item.title: 欧洲汽车股以 50%的折扣吸引低价猎手
item.description: 在经历了令人沮丧的一年之后，欧洲汽车制造商的股票终于找到了一些积极的动力，因为有迹象表明中国将采取更多的刺激措施，吸引投资者关注这一估值较低的行业。【原文：After a dismal year, shares of Europe’s automakers are finally finding some positive momentum as signs of additional Chinese stimulus draw investors to the sector’s lowly valuations.】

item.title: 研究显示，养老金谨慎令英国损失 250 亿英镑投资
item.description: 据资产管理公司 Columbia Threadneedle 称，随着储蓄者临近退休，对固定缴费养老金进行去风险化处理的做法将使英国在本届议会期间损失高达 250 亿英镑（320 亿美元）。【原文：The practice of de-risking defined contribution pension pots as savers close in on retirement will cost the UK as much as £25 billion ($32 billion) during the current Parliament, according to asset manager Columbia Threadneedle.】

item.title: 英国加速推进清洁能源有可能增加能源支出
item.description: 英国政府面临着为消费者带来更高的能源成本的风险，因为它正在努力实现一个具有挑战性的—升级—目标，即到 2030 年实现国家电力供应的去碳化。【原文：The UK government risks baking in higher energy costs for consumers as it pushes to meet a challenging — and upgraded — target to decarbonize the country’s power supply by 2030.】

item.title: 中国 AMEC 在起诉美国后被五角大楼除名
item.description: 美国国防部已将先进微细加工设备公司从中国军工企业名单中除名，该公司认为这是 "不合理的"。【原文：Advanced Micro-Fabrication Equipment Inc. has been removed from the US Department of Defense’s list of Chinese military companies, doing away with what the firm described as an “irrational” designation.】

item.title: 日产股票因可能与本田合并而大涨 24
item.description: 日产汽车公司（Nissan Motor Co.）的股价周三飙升24%，创下至少五十年来的最大涨幅，原因是人们希望与本田汽车公司（Honda Motor Co.）的潜在合作将挽救这家日本汽车制造商于金融危机之中。【原文：Nissan Motor Co.’s stock surged as much as 24% Wednesday, the most in at least five decades, on hopes that a potential tie-up with Honda Motor Co. will save the Japanese automaker from financial crisis.】

item.title: 特鲁多试图将副手离职说成是节日家庭矛盾
item.description: 贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）总理在其政党的年终庆典上笑容满面，试图淡化其领导层所面临的最严峻挑战。【原文：A defiant Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, all smiles at his political party’s end-of-year festivities, tried to downplay the most serious challenge yet facing his leadership.】

item.title: 菲律宾比索因降息押注而走低至历史最低点
item.description: 菲律宾比索跌向 1 美元兑 59 菲律宾比索跌向 1 美元兑 59 菲律宾比索跌向 1 美元兑 59 菲律宾比索跌向 1 美元兑 59 的心理里程碑，接近创下历史新低，因为对即将实行宽松政策的预期损害了菲律宾比索相对于本地区同类货币的吸引力。【原文：The Philippine peso dropped toward the psychological milestone of 59 per dollar, close to setting a fresh record low, as expectations for imminent easing hurt its appeal relative to regional peers.】

item.title: 芯片沙皇表示，即使推迟实现目标，日本也将支持 Rapidus
item.description: 日本执政党半导体小组主席表示，即使政府支持的 Rapidus 公司不得不推迟到 2027 年量产先进逻辑芯片的目标，日本对该公司的支持也不会动摇。【原文：Japan’s support for Rapidus Corp. won’t waver even if the government-backed venture has to delay its goal of mass producing advanced logic chips by 2027, according to the chairman of the ruling party’s group for semiconductors.】

item.description: 由佳能公司（Canon Inc.【原文：Space One Co., a Japanese startup backed by Canon Inc., failed a second time to launch its rocket in yet another setback for the country’s commercial space industry.】

item.title: 德意志银行试图解决公共区块链的合规障碍
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）正在努力解决金融机构在尝试使用公共区块链时面临的监管难题，例如无意中与罪犯或受制裁实体进行交易的风险。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG is working on a fix for the regulatory challenges financial institutions face when trying to use public blockchains, such as the risk of inadvertently transacting with criminals or sanctioned entities.】

item.title: Abrdn 押注中国长债，10 年期收益率目标为 1
item.description: Abrdn Plc 公司认为，由于通货紧缩的压力根深蒂固，以及货币政策进一步宽松的前景，中国飙升的较长期限债券仍值得买入。【原文：China’s surging longer-maturity bonds are still a buy due to entrenched deflationary pressures and the prospect of further monetary easing, according to Abrdn Plc.】

item.title: 价值 9.44 亿美元的首次公开募股后，Vishal Mega Mart 将在孟买亮相
item.description: Vishal Mega Mart Ltd. 的股票将于周三开始交易，此前该公司在印度今年最后一次大型新上市交易中筹集了 9.44 亿美元。【原文：Vishal Mega Mart Ltd.’s shares are set to start trading on Wednesday after raising $944 million in India’s last major new listing of the year.】

item.title: 印度影子银行 Shriram 为该行业寻求创纪录的离岸贷款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Shriram Finance Ltd. 正在就借入约 12.5 亿美元的社会贷款进行深入谈判，这将是印度影子贷款机构有史以来最大的一笔离岸贷款。【原文：Shriram Finance Ltd. is in advanced talks to borrow about $1.25 billion in a social loan, according to people with knowledge of the matter, a transaction that would be the biggest ever offshore facility by an Indian shadow lender.】

item.title: 贝恩将以 42 亿美元恶意竞购富士软，与 KKR 竞争
item.description: 贝恩资本（Bain Capital）计划在未获得公司董事会支持的情况下竞购日本软件公司富士软公司（Fuji Soft Inc.【原文：Bain Capital plans to make a bid to buy shares of Japanese software company Fuji Soft Inc. without support from the company’s board of directors, kicking off a rare hostile bid in Japan against KKR & Co.】

item.title: 黄金保持跌势，美联储明年利率前景受关注
item.description: 在美联储即将公布利率决议之前，黄金保持跌势，交易员们正在关注有关明年货币政策走向的线索。【原文：Gold held a decline ahead of the Federal Reserve’s upcoming rate decision, with traders watching for clues about next year’s monetary-policy path.】

item.title: 比特币首次突破 108,000 美元后暂停反弹
item.description: 比特币在首次突破 108,000 美元后稍事喘息，交易员们在等待美联储的降息预期，并评估当选总统唐纳德-特朗普对加密货币的支持所带来的乐观情绪。【原文：Bitcoin took a breather after scaling $108,000 for the first time as traders await an expected Federal Reserve interest-rate cut and assess a wave of optimism from President-elect Donald Trump’s support for crypto.】

item.title: 香港监察机构在上市调查中搜查金融公司办公室
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港证券监察机构上个月搜查了大约十几家金融公司和个人的办公室，作为对在纳斯达克交易所上市的公司进行调查的一部分。【原文：Hong Kong’s securities watchdog last month searched the offices of about a dozen finance firms and individuals as part of a probe of company listings on the Nasdaq Inc. exchange, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 恒天然首席执行官称美国关税政策可能损害客户需求
item.description: 全球最大的乳制品出口商恒天然合作社集团担心，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普计划征收的关税可能会损害美国和全球对其产品的需求。【原文：Fonterra Cooperative Group, the world’s biggest dairy exporter, is concerned that the tariffs planned by President-elect Donald Trump could hurt demand for its products both in the US and globally.】

item.title: 香港依靠中国上市企业推动 2025 年上市计划
item.description: 在近几个月回暖的基础上，香港的交易商们正押注于在内地上市的中国公司的二次上市，以推动明年的股票销售量。【原文：Hong Kong’s dealmakers are betting on mainland-traded Chinese companies’ second listings to boost share-sale volumes next year, building on a pickup in recent months.】

item.title: 66% 的英国年轻投资者 "做出投资决策的时间少于 24 小时
item.description: 城市监管机构的调查显示，三分之二（66%）的年轻投资者花不到 24 小时就做出了投资决定，七分之一（14%）的投资者在一小时内就做出了最终决定。【原文：Two-thirds (66%) of young investors spend less than 24 hours deciding on an investment, and on in seven (14%) finalise their decision in under an hour, according to research for the City regulator.】

item.title: 美联储将连续第三次降息
item.description: 美联储官员很可能在本周的会议上连续第三次降低借贷成本，同时还表示明年的降息次数将少于之前的预期。【原文：Federal Reserve officials are likely to lower borrowing costs for a third-straight meeting this week while also signaling fewer interest-rate cuts next year than previously projected.】

item.title: 日元疲软助力日本出口在不确定因素中增长
item.description: 在国外不确定性增加的情况下，日元走软对出口商有所帮助，因此日本 11 月份的出口再次录得增长。【原文：Japan’s exports posted another gain in November as the yen’s weakness helped exporters amid rising uncertainties abroad.】

item.title: 报告指出美国将大量削减石油库存，石油止跌回升
item.description: 由于一份行业报告显示美国商业原油库存大幅减少，原油在连续两天下跌后企稳。【原文：Oil steadied after a two-day drop as an industry report signaled a sizable drawdown in US commercial crude inventories.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 2025 年大选前预算赤字将扩大
item.description: 一份年中财政更新报告显示，由于政府支出增加和主要贸易伙伴中国的疲软，澳大利亚的预算在未来几年将进一步陷入赤字。【原文：Australia’s budget is expected to slip deeper into deficit in the years ahead due to rising government spending and a weakening in key trade partner China, a mid-year fiscal update showed, with a national election due in less than six months.】

item.title: 芯片制造商 Kioxia 在东京首次公开募股后取得进展
item.description: 存储芯片制造商 Kioxia Holdings Corp. 周三在东京证券交易所首次上市即告上涨，凸显了日本投资者对新股的良好需求。【原文：Memory-chip maker Kioxia Holdings Corp. rose in its debut on the Tokyo Stock Exchange on Wednesday, underscoring decent investor demand for new shares in Japan.】

item.title: 香港又一年失去近 40 名经纪人
item.description: 今年，香港有近 40 家经纪公司宣布倒闭，这标志着即使在推出了增加流动性的措施和中国的刺激政策重振交易之后，香港又度过了艰难的一年。【原文：Almost 40 brokers called it quits in Hong Kong this year, marking another difficult year even after measures to boost liquidity were unveiled and Chinese stimulus revived trading.】
